# Copilot Instructions for WebSpark.Bootswatch

## Project Overview

WebSpark.Bootswatch is a .NET 10 Razor Class Library that integrates Bootswatch themes into ASP.NET Core applications. It provides seamless Bootstrap 5 theme switching capabilities with light/dark mode support, caching mechanisms, and embedded static files.

**Version 2.0+ targets .NET 10 exclusively** to leverage the latest NuGet packages and framework features.

**Projects:**
- **WebSpark.Bootswatch**: Main library (.NET 10 Razor Class Library)
- **WebSpark.Bootswatch.Demo**: Demo application (.NET 10 ASP.NET Core)
- **WebSpark.Bootswatch.Tests**: Test project (.NET 10)
